name: CRM
description:
Coder's Rpg Maker.

Any tile size.
Eight tile levels -- four ground, two props, two ceiling.
Lossless auto tiles -- 3x3, 4x4, 8x6.
Cells hold editable tile offsets -- any level of nested ridges.
Editable cell passability -- four-directional.
Editable cell transparency.
Visibility, line of sight, field of vision, fog of war.
Javascript events.
Browser minigames (with full access to api) NPC commands as part of core package -- random, waypiont, pursuit, escape motion.
Combat is currently more of a place holder, but 6-8 party size is planned.
